terms.meaning: Programmable machine jo tasks automatically perform kar sakta hai.
Self-driving car jo bina human intervention chale.
Machines ko images aur videos understand karne ki ability.
Multiple sensors ka data combine kar ke better understanding.
Robot ke liye optimal route calculate karna.
Simultaneous Localization and Mapping for robot navigation.
terms.example: Robot apna location track kare aur map banaye.

terms.meaning: Robot parts ko move karne wala mechanical component.
Robot arm ka last part jo actual task perform karta hai.
Robot kitni directions mein move kar sakta hai.
terms.example: 6-DOF robot arm 6 directions mein move kare.

terms.meaning: Manufacturing processes ko automatic banana.
Robotic Process Automation for business tasks.
Multiple robots ka coordinated behavior.
Human jaise dikhne aur behave karne wala robot.
Humans ke saath safely work kar sakne wala robot.
terms.example: Cobot assembly line mein humans ke saath.

terms.meaning: Industrial applications ke liye computer vision.
Robot movements ko precisely control karna.
Robot joints aur links ki geometry aur motion.
Robot behavior control karne wala system.
Remote location se robot control karna.
terms.example: Mars rover remote control from Earth.

terms.meaning: Soft robotics mein flexible actuators.
terms.example: Pneumatic artificial muscles, shape memory alloys.

terms.meaning: Qubit, quantum information ka basic unit.
terms.example: Classical bit 0 ya 1, qubit superposition mein both.

terms.meaning: Quantum particle multiple states mein simultaneously exist karna.
terms.example: Qubit 0 aur 1 dono states mein same time.

terms.meaning: Do qubits ka mysterious connection, distance se independent.
Quantum operations perform karne wala basic building block.
terms.example: Pauli-X gate, Hadamard gate, CNOT gate.

terms.meaning: Quantum gates ka sequence jo quantum algorithm implement kare.
Quantum computer classical computer se faster performance.
Quantum states ka environmental interference se destroy hona.
terms.example: Qubits ka classical behavior mein collapse.

terms.meaning: Quantum information ko errors se protect karne ka method.
Optimization problems solve karne ka quantum method.
Quantum mechanics use kar ke secure communication.
Quantum computers ke liye designed algorithms.
Quantum systems simulate karne wala classical computer.
ML algorithms ko quantum computers pe run karna.
Noisy Intermediate-Scale Quantum devices.
terms.example: Current quantum computers with limited qubits.

terms.meaning: Quantum computer ki overall capability measure.
Qubit states ko visualize karne ka 3D representation.
terms.example: Sphere surface pe qubit state points.

terms.meaning: Classical FFT ka quantum version.
Quantum chemistry problems solve karne ka hybrid algorithm.
Quantum state ko distant location pe transfer karna.
terms.example: Entanglement use kar ke information transfer.

terms.meaning: Slow evolution use kar ke quantum computation.
